-e ---

𐀣 qa ⇔ 𐀒 ko qooph / peg 𐀣 qa 𐘌 QA 󲄽 kalpis Kelch cauldron kálpē ka-ro-pa carafe 𐀣 qa 𐘌 QA *H₂ambhi ‘two / both / on both sides’ > amphoreús ‘two-handled jar with narrow neck’

peculiar

𐀣-𐀯-𐀩-𐀄 qa-si-re-u Quasirex “boss” “king” βασιλεύς (𐀞-𐀯 pa-si all everyone lex/rex)

𐀳𐀣𐀆 te-qa-de Θήβανδε (Θήβαι) place name (>Thebes?)
